title: Social Media Clone
description: A Facebook-like website with posting, commenting, authentication, updating profile, follow/unfollow features.

title: Prayers Time
description: I used Al-Adhan API to get the timings by country ISO2 & city name.

title: أذكارُنا
description: User-friendly website that displays the athkar categorized by morning, evening and sleep athkar, quran and messengers prayers.

title: Animals Sounds
description: I used javascript to play the sound of an animal either onClick or onKeydown of the initial letter.

title: Live Characters Counter
description: I used javascript to calculate the characters while typing.

title: CSS Style Changer
description: Users can modify text color, and image (width, border-radius, padding and blur).

title: Expenses Tracker
description: Allows users to add or delete expenses for finance management.

title: Password Generator
description: Generating random passwords based on user-selected criteria (length, uppercase letters, numbers, and special characters).

title: Stardust Flowers Shop Clone
description: Flowers shop landing page clone with products listings, and a responsive design.

title: Glass Morphism
description: A responsive glass morphism hero section design for modern landing pages. It was a part of a Twitter coding challenge.

title: KSA Founding Day
description: A landing page clone for the KSA founding day offical website. It was a part of a Twitter coding challenge.

title: Calculator
description: A responsive, fully functional simple calculator using javascript.

title: Coachbit Membership Plans Clone
description: A responsive, modern clone for Coachbit membership plans page.

title: Elzero Template 3 Clone
description: A modern and fully responsive template created to practice front-end development and design skills.
